extension.summary: Extended version of the TIDAL music add-on
extension.description:
Play music and video from TIDAL music streaming service.
Requires subscription. Visit tidal.com for details.

Spielt Music und Videos vom Streaming-Dienst TIDAL.
Es wird ein Abbonement benötigt. Siehe tidal.com für Details.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial client and is not supported nor endorsed by TIDAL.
Dies ist eine inoffizieller Client, der von TIDAL nicht unterstützt wird.

extension.news:
v2.0.0-beta10 (2017-01-30) - Now shows an Error Message if login fails - Added Page-Mode for Playlist-Item View - Increased max. page size from 999 to 9999 - Bugfix: MQA Label extension was missing in Favorite Tracks - Emulation of "User Album Playlists": a) Shows Album List instead of Tracks if Playlist description contains the keyword ALBUM b) "Default Album Playlist" can be set for Plugin function "user_playlist_toggle" c) Shows User Album Playlist Name in Album Label d) New Context Menu Entries for Album Items to Add/Remove Albums to/from Album Playlists e) Every Playlist can be opend as "Album Playlist" with a new Context Menu Entry
v2.0.0-beta9 (2017-01-21) - Page mode for Master Albums folder - Set MQA in blue color into Labels of Master Albums and Tracks - Keep Username for next login if password is not saved into settings
